TopicTitle: 10 Tylo landings in 1 launch no refueling or mining

Articles.Content: After I decided to do something that nobody has done before I give you my largest ship to date, the Tylotastic. Here on it's maiden voyage it had 10 landers take kerbals to the surface and return them safely to Kerbin.
That's a landing per sub, dear lord! Incredible work, comrade!
Wow!  Nice project.  I look forward to seeing some of the other projects you were discussing in the captions.

I'm desperately trying to keep my jaw from hitting the keyboard!  Using the jetpacks to get that final push back into orbit is one of the most "Kerbal" things I've seen in a long time!

Outstanding!
You never fail to impress me! Nice job!
